snippet: A boat packed with revelers on a long holiday weekend collided with a ferry and sank off Hong Kong, killing at least 38 people and injuring dozens.
abstract: Police arrest two boat captains and five crew members who were manning vessels that collided in Hong Kong's Victoria Harbor on suspicion of endangering the safety of others at sea; collision, which occurred on October 1 during a celebration of China's National Day, killed 38 people and injured 101.
lead_paragraph: A boat packed with revelers on a long holiday weekend collided with a ferry and sank off Hong Kong, killing at least 38 people and injuring dozens.

headline.seo: 7 Crew Members Detained in Hong Kong Harbor Crash
headline.main: 7 Crew Members Are Detained in Deadly Collision of 2 Boats in Hong Kong
headline.print_headline: 7 Crew Members Are Detained in Deadly Collision of 2 Boats in Hong Kong
